Mike Pence shut the door today on a run for the presidency, but left open the likelihood that he'll seek a different office: Governor of Indiana. Oggi- ha detto il presidente e Ceo di Nokia, Stephen Elop - sviluppatori, operatori e consumatori vogliono telefoni cellulari irresistibili, che non siano soltanto un apparecchio telefonico, ma che abbiano software, servizi, applicazioni e supporto ai clienti che facciano di un telefono una grande esperienza. Nokia e Microsoft uniranno le loro forze per consegnare un prodotto senza rivali . many unanswered questions about too many important people, companies and institutions...[ This] suggests that David Cameron 's lack of judgment over Andy Coulson is even more striking.'' uncomfortable questions remain for the prime minister. This affair casts serious doubt on the prime minister's judgment. He saw fit to appoint Mr Andy Coulson as the Conservative party's director of communications when the former editor was tarred by association with the phone-hacking scandal. Why would he want such a compromised spokesman? Was he naive enough to believe Mr Andy Coulson 's assurances? Or did he not care about what had taken place? Neither scenario is very comforting. `` I think that Mr Andy Coulson has much more explaining to do.
